title: Person of Interest | Bear
author: greysbear.
comment: easily the best character on the show
Bear is not only a great character, the dogs used were some of the best (and obviously happiest) animal actors I’ve ever seen.  The interaction with the human characters is exceptionally well done.
Bear brought a totally new aspect to the show and it worked . Made the show so much better

Q: What would Person of Interest be without Bear?
A: Still good ... but not AS good!
i like the part where the dog really did eat the homework! haha
